summary: Replaces the sneak attack sound with a clip of "SHIA SURPRISE" from the song and video "Shia Labeouf Live" by Rob Cantor.
descriptionHtml:
Really just a remake of a mod made by 'Bass Off 101' updated for Skyrim: Special Edition.

Replaces the sneak attack sound with a clip of "SHIA SURPRISE" from the song and video "Shia Labeouf Live" by Rob Cantor.

I started completely from scratch adding it to the game, The only thing that was used from Bass Off 101 was the original idea.
author: skipperki1
